parameter.value: It was a pleasure to help you, |PLAYERNAME|.
Here. Don't forget that you need to buy a label too if you want to send a parcel. Always write the name of the receiver in the first line and the name of the city in the second line.
With our mail system you can send letters and parcels to other Tibians.
If you want to buy a letter, just ask me. Or do you want me to explain how letters work?
With our mail system you can send letters and parcels to other Tibians. I can either explain how letters and parcels work or sell them to you.
The depots you can send parcels or letters to are in the following cities Ab'Dendriel, Ankrahmun, Carlin, Darashia, Edron, Kazordoon, Port Hope, Thais and Venore.
Well, the receiver - or addressee - is the person you want to send mail to. He or she can pick up your mail in the depot of the city you send it to.
I sell parcels and letters. I can also explain how the mail system works.
